DOC.brief_title: Clinical Efficacy and Safety of Autologous Cultured Keratinocyte Cell on Severe Burn Wood
DOC.criteria: Age : 1~70 years More than 30% TBSA of second degree burn or more than 10% TBSA of third degree burn Must provide signed informed consent prior to participation in any studyrelated procedures Have a pyogenic infection Part of the facial cosmetic surgery cost Hypersensitivity reactions in patients with bovine proteins Hypersensitivity reactions in patients with Gentamycin Pregnancy or lactation
